results.banter_text: "Whoa, didn't quite make it this time, level 25! 😅💀 Don't worry, we've all been there. You'll respawn in a jiffy. Keep going, you're on a roll! ⚔️ Remember, every defeat is just a chance to come back stronger with your trusty 🛡️ shield."
variations: "Don't worry, champ! You've been down to 25 before... literally 😂. Just respawn and get back in the fight with your trusty sword 💀⚔️. Remember, every defeat is a lesson learned and a step closer to ultimate victory! Keep going, you've got this! 💪"
"Whoa, didn't quite get away with that one, level 25! 😅 You've got this though - you respawn and come back stronger than ever! ⚔️ Death is just a setback, not a defeat. What's your plan for revenge?"

results.banter_text: "HA! We did it, champ! 🎉 Boss defeated at level 50, what a fantastic achievement! The ultimate victory is all yours! This incredible feat will go down in gaming history. Your mastery of the game is unmatched. What's next? The unbeatable Ultra-Boss awaits! ⚔️"
variations: "🎉 WOOHOO! Just defeated the ultimate boss with a single hit! Level 50 mastery in action mode is ON POINT! 😆 This victory was AMAZING, my friend! I'm thrilled to have taken down the behemoth and claimed the top prize 🏆! You can't handle the awesomeness of this win... yet. 👊"

"YESSSS! 😅 We just took down the infamous Kraelion, level 50 boss of the realm! Incredible teamwork and strategy paid off, folks! Fantastic execution by our squad - we are UNDEFEATED! 🏆 The thrill of victory is always amazing, but defeating this behemoth on the first try? That's pure legend status! 👊"

results.banter_text: "OH MAN! Did you see that drop? That rare 💎 item is EPIC! I've been farming this server for months and finally got my hands on the legendary sword. Now I'm unstoppable at level 75! 🎁✨ Bring it on, endgame!"
variations: "OH MAN, I just got a rare item drop from that level 80 boss! 😍 It's EPIC, but I'm not even sure if it's legendary... did you see the description? ✨ Maybe I'll be able to upgrade my gear with this 💎"

"OH MY GOSH, DUDE! 🎁 I just got a rare drop from that mythic boss! It's EPIC, but what's even crazier is I heard there's a legendary one hidden somewhere in the game. We need to quest it out and see if we can find it! 💎 Would be LEGENDARY to have that on our team!"

results.banter_text: "Level_up mode activated! You're crushing level 30 and getting ready to take on even greater challenges. Remember, progress is not just about numbers, it's about growth - keep pushing yourself to achieve new heights! 💪📈"
variations: "Level up, champion! You've made it to 30! 📈 Your progress is unstoppable. Remember, every conquest, every overcome, brings you closer to ultimate victory. What's next? The world is waiting for your legend to shine bright ⭐💪"

"It's time to level up, champ! You've made incredible progress at 30 levels in. Now it's time to conquer new challenges and overcome even greater obstacles! You've got this! 💪 Your growth is unstoppable, and I have no doubt you'll achieve greatness on your next level up 📈⭐"

results.banter_text: "WOOHOO 🎉🔥 You've taken down the enemy team with an **INCONCEIVABLE** combo! Level 15 and still SHREDDING the competition 💥 That was a **FANTASTIC** display of skill! I'm not surprised, you're on fire 🔴⚡️. An amazing game from start to finish, and you close it out with a BOOM 🤯. You should be proud, you've EARNED that win!"
variations: "WOOHOO! 😤 Congrats on that EPIC PvP victory, pvp_victory!!! 🏆 You're a true champion at level 15! Your reflexes are AMAZING and your combat skills are INCREDBILE 💥👊! That was FANTASTIC gameplay - you totally DOMINATED the arena! 👏 Can't wait to see what other AWESOME feats you'll accomplish next!"

"YESSSS! 🎉👏 PVP VICTORY ALERT! 🚨 I KNEW YOU HAD IT IN YOU! 😤 15th level? MORE LIKE 15TH LEAGUE CHAMPION! 🔥 Your aim was ON FIRE and your reflexes were INSTANTANEOUS! 💥 I'm not surprised you took down the enemy team, but still... FANTASTIC JOB, CHAMPION! 👑 That win is a testament to your AMAZING skills and INCREDBILE strategy! 🤩"
